win[source]

win(player)

Print win message

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

lose[source]

lose(player)

Print loss message

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
win("Charlie")

'Charlie has won!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert win("Foo") == "Foo has won!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class KingAlbert[source]

KingAlbert(player, status=True)

A game of King Albert for player player, using win and lose

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

KingAlbert.final_msg[source]

KingAlbert.final_msg()

Find out if you've won or lost

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
game = KingAlbert("Jenny", False)
game.final_msg()

'Jenny has lost!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
game = KingAlbert("Bar", True)
assert game.final_msg() == "Bar has won!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
